entry.title: What Remains When the Monument Falls
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,930Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 28

Summary: The Batcave had always held secrets, but none as raw as Jason Todd’s memorial—a shrine of glass and grief, a monument to the son Bruce Wayne had failed.Now, with the Batfamily closer than ever, Bruce decides it’s time to let go of the past. When Jason is summoned to the manor, he braces for the same old cycle of guilt and discord. Instead, he finds his father standing before the memorial, tools in hand, ready to shatter that symbol of pain once and for all.As the glass fractures, Jason is forced to confront the question that’s haunted him since he clawed his way out of the grave:Who is he now——when he’s no longer the dead Robin,—no longer the failed vigilante?

entry.title: For the years to keep on spinning
entry.summary:
Author: ionia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,302Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 34

Summary: After almost ten years of marriage, Bruce and Clark’s relationship is strained and they're not in sync anymore. Now, with their anniversary coming up, can they bridge the gap? The rest of their combined family takes matters in their own hands and organize a getaway for the two. Unfortunately, the only way to make the world's finest take a vacation is to parent trap them into a fake dating and fake mission trip halfway across the world.Unfortunately, Clark finds out about this scheme and now he must navigate the trip with a prickly bathusband, all while trying to salvage their marriage. FYI: Work is finished and will be updated twice a week!

entry.title: Man of Tomorrow
entry.summary:
Author: clumsycanon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,053Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 24

Summary: Clark Kent always wanted to be a hero.When Vought calls after his viral rescue, he says yes. Yes to the suit, the fame, the Seven. Yes to the spotlight he’s spent his whole life hiding from.But under the surface of glittering galas and carefully staged interviews, something darker simmers—inside the tower, inside Homelander’s smile, inside himself.And then there’s Bruce Wayne: billionaire, enigma, walking contradiction. The only person who sees Clark—not just Superman. Not just the symbol.But even Bruce has secrets. And when an impossible robot drops from the sky glowing with something that hurts Clark in ways he’s never known, everything begins to crack.Clark must face who he is. Kal-El. Clark Kent. Superman.Alien. Weapon. Hope.The truth is out there.And it might just break them all.~~~~~~A Superman x The Boys fusion where Clark joins the Seven, falls for Bruce Wayne, and unravels everything he thought he knew—about Vought, about Krypton, and about himself.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,107Chapters: 34/?Kudos: 199

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort.Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad.Heavily inspired by Batman/Superman The Animated Series, Justice League, and Justice League Unlimited. Also takes inspiration from The Batman (2022), My Adventures With Superman (2023), Batman: Caped Crusader (2024), Smallville (2001), Batman (1966), and various comics, including the World's Finest and Public Enemies series.

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 118,519Chapters: 9/65Kudos: 235

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.ORThe one in which they are both trapped and enslaved by Clark's growing sexual desire and his alien physiology. (They have a lot of sex, sometimes, Bruce doesn't or can't consent) oh, and major feels too, I guess.

entry.title: Parenting Justice
entry.summary:
Author: Yuri_Osakawa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,139Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 57

Summary: In one world, Johnathan and Martha Kent found a baby in a spaceship.In this world, they found a baby alongside two adults.In this world, someone else became the Dark Knight of Gotham. A loving father that survived what would’ve been a tragic accident in another world.In this world, someone else became the Wonder Woman. An immortal queen, and a mother.In this world, a father gained access to the Speed Force instead of his son.In this world, another test pilot found a dying alien and gained the Green Lantern ring.In this world, a queen rules the oceans.Because parenting justice is much tougher than delivering it.

entry.title: Quieter Without You
entry.summary:
Author: lostinreeverie

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,535Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 259

Summary: Bruce lingered at the table, packing away his notes slowly as he watched Clark head straight for Ray. The two fell into step naturally, laughing about something—Ray gesturing animatedly while Clark leaned in slightly, nodding with that wide, easy smile of his. Bruce couldn’t hear them, but it didn’t matter. He knew that look. Knew that tone, even when he couldn’t hear the words. They disappeared out the door together, voices muffled to silence as it slid shut behind them. It was fine. He was cool with it. Even if the cold feeling in his gut hadn’t gone away. “Ouch,” said Oliver, sidling up beside him. “Looks like you’ve been replaced, Bats.” Or, Bruce doesn’t get jealous—except maybe when someone starts stealing all of Clark’s attention.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
